RelatedSentence: Lincoln Electric is the world leader in the design , development and manufacture of arc welding products , robotic arc welding systems , plasma and oxyfuel cutting equipment and has a leading global position in the brazing and soldering alloys market .

Lincoln Electric is the world leader in the design , development and manufacture of arc welding products , robotic arc welding systems , plasma and oxyfuel cutting equipment and has a leading global position in the brazing and soldering alloys market .
